titleStmt.title: The triall of Judge Jengins [sic] at the House of Commons barre: upon an impeachment of high-treason, on Munday last, Februa. 21. 1647. With heads of the charge read against him. And his answer. Also the votes of the House of Commons thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern 1648. Feb. 21: imprimatur, Gilb. Mabbot,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb: 22"; publication date altered to 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern 1648. Feb. 21: imprimatur
